original_text: So I decided to study how much wisdom and knowledge really help a person. I wanted to learn if it was better than someone who only does foolish things. But this was also useless, like somebody who tries to catch the wind. So I decided to study how much wisdom and knowledge really help a person. So I decided to study how much wisdom and knowledge really help a person. I wanted to learn if it was better than someone who only does foolish things. But this was also useless, like somebody who tries to catch the wind. So I decided to study how much wisdom and knowledge really help a person. I wanted to learn if it was better than someone who only does foolish things. But this was also useless, like somebody who tries to catch the wind.
korean_text: 내가 다시 지혜를 알고자 하며 미친 것들과 미련한 것들을 알고자 하여 마음을 썼으나 이것도 바람을 잡으려는 것인 줄을 깨달았도다

sentences.original_text: So I decided to study how much wisdom and knowledge really help a person
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 지혜와 지식이 얼마나 사람에게 도움이 되는지 연구하기로 결심했다

sentences.original_text: I wanted to learn if it was better than someone who only does foolish things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 어리석은 일만 하는 사람보다 더 나은지 알고 싶었다

sentences.original_text: like somebody who tries to catch the wind
